Articles.Content:
I have another case of a strange spontaneous explosion : i have prepared a maneuver node 45 mins in the future to get out of minmus and visit kerbol's SOI.

I'm warping to the maneuver node, but whenever i get close to the node the ship explodes.

![p4USym8.png](http://i.imgur.com/p4USym8.png)

This ship is OLD, it was launched in 1.0.2, and I recently took it from Kerbin to Minmus with no issue.

Link to the save [https://www.dropbox.com/s/tiru7uncheuyts1/explosion20150630.sfs?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/tiru7uncheuyts1/explosion20150630.sfs?dl=0)

The ship is "Passenger4\_2.5KDV"

edit : list of installed mods

![wfJAUqk.png](http://i.imgur.com/wfJAUqk.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-01T07:20:14Z" title="07/01/2015 07:20  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 1, 2015</time> by Finndibaenn**
  
moving imags to imgur

Those dropbox links need to be public ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Lots of people are getting this sort of issue. Some people only have stock and others like me had a lot of mods. Removing FAR sorted mine, however it doesn't work for all and probably isn't directly FAR causing it.

oh ... the images/links were working for me, but i guess i have some kind of remember em cookies; sorry about that, i'm not yet familiar with dropbox.

Seems like i can't create img links to dropbox hosted files, that's a shame ... moving the images to imgur
